    • Uses of HalResourceLoader in io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.api.spi

      Methods in io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.api.spi that return HalResourceLoader 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static HalResourceLoader HalResourceLoader.create()
      Create a HalResourceLoader that uses a HttpURLConnection with default configuration to load the upstream resources.
      static HalResourceLoader HalResourceLoader.create​(HttpClientSupport client)
      Create a HalResourceLoader that uses a custom HTTP client, but does not implement any caching.
